## \_getStartOfDayTime() function

Get the time in milliseconds at the start of a given day

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getStartOfDayTime(date: Immutable<DateInput>): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | Immutable&lt;DateInput&gt; | A date input for the given day |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The start of the given day in milliseconds
